Posts.Content: Sep 27, 2012 06:47PM Ritab wrote: There is a service called megabus that goes from Cincinnati through Indianapolis to Chicago.  megabus.com It is pretty cheap (leaves the driving to them) and I have heard good things aobut it, like on time, nice, takes 6 hours, and is usually around $40 each way.  If anyone is considering going to  the conference, this is how my aunt and I are going.  I would like to meet somewhere in Chigaco with people on these discussion boards, too.  How about weall wear something to identify us?  like a pin on the very top of our right shoulder or something like that??  Or a flower in our hair, wig, scarf, ear......???
Posts.Title: MBCN Annual Conference is Oct. 13 in Chicago: Who is Going? EnglishMajor LuAnnH

Posts.Content: Oct 10, 2012 06:51PM Ritab wrote: Hey, LuAnn, YAY!!!  I found it.  Thanks for your help on this DB thing!!  Looking forward to getting the list and meeting up with others!  See ya there!  Rita

Posts.Content: Sep 28, 2012 10:22AM Ritab wrote: Yes, I am coming to the pizza party!  Looking forward to it.  Yes, I know Deb, too!  I helped out a bit last year with the conference in Indy (thanks to Deb!!)  The sticker idea sounds good!  I am new to this discussion board, but have been reading it for the past couple of weeks and have gained much info. BTW, I ordered a parking pass for the reduced rate ($30) when I registered for the conference, but we decided to take the megabus, so I will not need it.  Is therre anyone who could use it??  I am thinking that it is already paid for--even if it is not, I will pay for it because I know the committee had to know ahead of time to purchase them.  Better to have an extra than to have none!!   I hope someone else can use it. Do you have someone matching people up for roommates if they need one?
